sys_script.name: UserIDGenerator

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_828be61d47f33110a18beb02d16d43d1
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1303803_manual_0_users</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>UserIDGenerator</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
    // Check if the UserID field is empty
    if (!current.user_id) {
        // Generate a unique identifier 
        var uniqueID = 'USER_' + current.sys_id.substr(0, 6); // Example: USER_123456
        
        // Set the generated unique identifier in the UserID field
        current.user_id = uniqueID;
    }
})(current, previous);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-17 04:00:39</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>828be61d47f33110a18beb02d16d43d1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>UserIDGenerator</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="ManualsTracker" source="x_1303803_manual_0">573f087447773110a18beb02d16d4310</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ManualsTracker">573f087447773110a18beb02d16d4310</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_828be61d47f33110a18beb02d16d43d1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-19 00:06:22</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=828be61d47f33110a18beb02d16d43d1"/></record_update>
